short_summary: Intermediate Procurement Specialists and Property Planners for Real Property
description: Notice of Proposed Procurement - RFP against Supply Arrangement W8486-239070/A. The Department of National Defence requires Intermediate Procurement Specialists and Property Planners for the management of real property. This requirement is open to all pre-qualified competition under the TSPS SA E60ZT-18TSPS. Interested bidders are urged to carefully review the bid solicitation document to ensure their company is qualified to bid on this requirement. Vendors are required to submit a proposal that meets all requirements outlined in the bid solicitation document. The bid solicitation document can be requested via the email address below. Contract Authority: Cathy Thompson cathy.thompson@forces.gc.ca constituting the contracting authority in this supply arrangement name of the  Minister of Public Works and Government Services The Honourable Maryam Monsef
